# status

**Instance Property**

A value that describes the lane’s status.

## Declaration

```swift
var status: CPLaneStatus { get set }
```

## Discussion

One of the [doc://com.apple.carplay/documentation/CarPlay/CPLaneStatus] values that describes the lane’s status.

## Properties

- **primaryAngle**: A value that represents the angle the framework highlights if this lane is preferred or good.
- **secondaryAngles**: A list of the remaining angles of this lane guidance.
